title: Murkowski Says She Will Rank Peltola First on Her Ballot in Alaska
description: Senator Lisa Murkowski, a centrist Republican facing a tough re-election campaign, said she would support Representative Mary Peltola, a Democrat, to serve a full term in the House.
dc:creator: Emily Cochrane
media:credit: Ash Adams for The New York Times
media:description: Senator Lisa Murkowski is fending off Kelly Tshibaka, a right-wing challenger endorsed by former President Donald J. Trump and the stateâ€™s Republican Party.
